description: Try our easy to follow Coconut Dahl With Toasted Naan Fingers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Indian curry,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Peanut free
name: Coconut Dahl With Toasted Naan Fingers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a heavy-based saucepan and cook the onion over a high heat, stirring, for 1 minute, then stir in the curry paste and lentils. Pour in the coconut milk, then fill the can with water and add to the lentils. Simmer briskly, uncovered, for 8-9 minutes until the lentils are tender and the mixture is thick and pulpy.
Meanwhile, lightly toast the naan breads under a preheated high grill until warm and golden. Cut into fingers and serve alongside the dahl for dipping.
